fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Plant a seed on dead playerâ€™s grave. Two days later, they will be reanimated as a random Institution member (cannot be a Institution Power). The revival is public.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If a player rolls Farmer and there is currently no Leader, turn said player into the Leader.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
\_\_\_\_\_\_ was revived by a Farmer!~
You were revived as the \_\_\_\_\_\_ by a Farmer!~
